title: Dunk Master Darius is still bugged
body: If you cast your E, your cursor will bug out, removing the ability to click on enemies, the minimap, or ping.

replies.body:
What are your settings relating to casting? Quick cast? Quick Cast with indicators? Normal Cast? etc? 

Do did you happen to figure out what cause this? We are having trouble pin pointing this too.. :'(

I am having an issue with only the dunkmaster skin, where after activating the W crippling strike: prevents targeting minions/players. The mouse icon changes to a red reticle similar to a warning ping.

I am using default settings.

I have quick cast with indicators on all 4 abilities.

E works fine on minions and monsters, but pulling champions will enable the bug. 

Your cursor will turn into A: A red sword or B: A blue cross-hairs. Sometimes the cross-hairs will be green. 

You are enable to auto attack (unless using auto attack move) by clicking on enemy champions, monsters, or minions. You cannot move your screen via the minimap, or use the hotkeys with a mouse drag to ping. The bug will disappear inconsistently. Sometimes clicking on the minimap a few times will fix it. Other times moving the camera to the shop and double clicking on the shop keeper will fix it.

From what I have red, Renekton also has this bug on his E. 

Dunkmaster is the only skin in which Darius has this problem. 

That's all I know ;-;
